name: Curse of Limitation.
description:
****** A CONTROLLER IS REQUIRED*****

You are a powerful knight who has been cursed by a witch limiting his use to only one piece of equipment at a time.

Two friends, one game developer, one big fan of GMTK & also really great math's teacher.

*****OTHER NOTES & BUG LIST*****

As this was a game jam, there will multiple bugs.

- The most well known one & game breaking is falling into a bottomless pit does not restart the game.
